definition: to enter oneself for an examination
to announce/to inform/report/newspaper/recompense/revenge/CL:份[fen4],張|张[zhang1]
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam

sentences.english: Went to IB-CAS, decided to take the phd exam and try to follow a academician.
sentences.chinese: 去了一次北京植物所，定下来报考一位院士的博士。

sentences.english: Recruiting departments shall take measures to facilitate citizens' registration for examination.
sentences.chinese: 招录机关应当采取措施，便利公民报考。

sentences.english: Do you take GESE in level two?
sentences.chinese: 你报考三一口语二级吗？

sentences.english: As potential applicants have noted, it takes time and energy to prepare for the examination.
sentences.chinese: 一些报考的学生说，考研既费时间又耗精力。

sentences.english: We confirmed which the Registration Number XXXXXXX is successful registered or valid.
sentences.chinese: 其次，对于您同学的报考，咱们认为是有效的。

sentences.english: Placard of the Zhengyuan below the arrangement that becomes in Lu Huai took an examination of graduate student of naval ships college.
sentences.chinese: 在鲁淮成的安排下郑远海报考了舰艇学院研究生。

sentences.english: All students will be sent to ABRSM examination.
sentences.chinese: 所有学生保送报考英国皇家音乐试，成绩优异。

sentences.english: What kind of foreign students can apply for Admission to RDFZ?
sentences.chinese: 什么样的外国生学可以报考人大附中？

sentences.english: Understanding wants to enter oneself for an examination before the second-round exam the data that school place asks to carry, take complete.
sentences.chinese: 复试前要了解报考院校所要求携带的资料，并带全。

sentences.english: MeiLin: You should try out for the school.
I want to apply to a Canadian university. Do I need four provincial courses?
sentences.chinese: 报考加拿大的大学需要通过四科省级会考吗？

sentences.english: But her mom constantly nags her to take the civil service exam.
sentences.chinese: 但是她的母亲却经常要她去报考公务员。

sentences.english: This service is somewhat like an electronic or online version of it.
sentences.chinese: 这项服务有点像一个电子版本或在线版本的报考指南。

sentences.english: The candidates didn't all get through.
Word has it that even models have registered to take this flight attendant exam.
sentences.chinese: 据说连模特儿都来报考这次空服员招考。

sentences.english: No wonder millions of soldiers and civil servants sit in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 难怪这几年报考公务员的千军万马。

definition: to advertise an entrance examination for an academic institution (old)
